data.eml:eml: Two new African siblings of Pulveroboletusravenelii (Boletaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Badou, Sylvestre A., esel, Andre De, Raspe, Olivier, Ryberg, Martin K., Atsu K. Guelly,, Yorou, Nourou S. (2018): Two new African siblings of Pulveroboletusravenelii (Boletaceae). MycoKeys 43: 115-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.43.30776, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.43.30776
